name: Avarice is a Brick
text:
Target 1 banished "Brick-Eyes" monster; add it to your hand, and if you do, you can apply one of the following effects:
● Draw 2 cards and discard 1 card.
● Special Summon 1 "Brick-Eyes" monster from your hand or GY.
You can only activate 1 "Avarice is a Brick" per turn.
